Body:
file_menu = self.get_menu_from_frame(self.frame, 'File')
export_images_menu = file_menu.FindItemById(file_menu.FindItem('&Save plot')
    ).GetSubMenu()
export_all_images_menu_evt = wx.PyCommandEvent(wx.EVT_MENU.typeId,
    export_images_menu.FindItem('&Save all plots'))
self.frame.ProcessEvent(export_all_images_menu_evt)
